description: <p>We are looking for a Salaried GP to join our multidisciplinary team. We are a large practice serving an urban and rural population in beautiful West Wales. Our multidisciplinary team includes Nurses, HCA's, Nurse Practitioner, Pharmacists, Social Worker, Occupational Therapist and MSK Practitioner. We are a training practice, training Nurse Practitioners, Medical Students, GP's and Physcian Associates.<br /> We are involved in occupational health, family planning, advace diabetic care and minor surgery.<br /> We would encourage you to speak to us directly if you have any queries. We would like to meet you should you wish to come and see the practice for yourself.</p>

hiringOrganization.name: GP Practices - Hywel Dda University Health Board

title: Salaried General Practitioner
